stocks.ai_explanation: Exxon Mobil Corporation (XOM) is a major global oil and gas company that operates in multiple regions around the world. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.

Chevron Corporation (CVX) is another prominent oil and gas company known for its extensive operations in the Middle East and other parts of the world. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
Nexen Inc. (NEE) is a Canadian oil and gas exploration and production company. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
Shell plc (SHEL) is a multinational oil and gas company headquartered in the United Kingdom. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
British Petroleum (BP) is a leading international oil and gas company. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
